title: [Neuroscience] People with a risk factor of depression benefit more from periods of high non exercise activity, studies shows

[Medicine] Another paper on the Havana Syndrome: An Assessment of Illness in U.S. Government Employees and Their Families at Overseas Embassies. This paper considers 4 sources: RF energy; Chemical; Infection; Psychological/Social. Conclusion briefly states RF energy is most "germane". It is long, 64 pages.
